text: Chaithanyam is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jayan Adiyattu, starring Murali and Madhavi in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Murali as Devadathan * Madhavi as Savithri * Jagadish *Thilakan as Brahmadathan Namboothiri *Narendra Prasad as Thekkepattu Ravunni Nair *Vijaya Raghavan as Rajan *Mala Aravindan as Krishnankutty *Kuthiravattom Pappu as Gopalji *KPAC Lalitha as Kathreena *Chithra as Sreedevi *Valsala Menon as Karthyayani *Jose Pellisseri as Thoma *VK Sriraman as Hajiyar *Remadevi as Sarojini ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Chaithanyam
